attributeDefinition: site ID containing of four plots
definition: site ID containing of four plots

attributeDefinition: x coordinate of id.plot / WGS84 / EPSG 4326
y coordinate of id.plot / WGS84 / EPSG 4327

comment: Infos from the Grassworks project (see Temperton et al. 2025, https://doi.org/10.32942/X2192S)

attributeDefinition: ID of the ecoregion sensu Dinerstein et al. (2017)
name of the eco.id sensu Dinerstein et al. (2017)

comment: Infos from the Grassworks project (see Temperton et al. 2025, https://doi.org/10.32942/X2192S)

attributeDefinition: EUNIS habitat type according to expert system (EUNIS-ESy) of Chytrý et al. (2020)
factor: R / R1A / R21 / R22 / R35 / R37 / V / V11 / V15 / V32 / V37 / V38 / ? = no clear result
comment: abbreviations of levels are explained in Chytrý et al. (2020) Appl Veg Sci https://doi.org/10.1111/avsc.12519

attributeDefinition: Each restored site got a positive and negative reference site close by
comment: Infos from the Grassworks project (see Temperton et al. 2025, https://doi.org/10.32942/X2192S)

attributeDefinition: Expert judgement about the hydrological site conditions
comment: Infos from the Grassworks project (see Temperton et al. 2025, https://doi.org/10.32942/X2192S)

attributeDefinition: Is the area fertilized or not
comment: Infos from the Grassworks project (see Temperton et al. 2025, https://doi.org/10.32942/X2192S)

attributeDefinition: Is the area mown, grazed or both?
comment: Infos from the Grassworks project (see Temperton et al. 2025, https://doi.org/10.32942/X2192S)

attributeDefinition: Community-weighed mean based on abundance data for specific leaf area
comment: Traits data from GIFT database (Weigelt et al. 2020, https://doi.org/10.1111/jbi.13623), index calculation according to FD package (Laliberté and Legendre 2010, https://doi.org/10.1890/08-2244.1)

attributeDefinition: Community-weighted mean based on presence-absence data for specific leaf area
comment: Traits data from GIFT database (Weigelt et al. 2020, https://doi.org/10.1111/jbi.13623), index calculation according to FD package (Laliberté and Legendre 2010, https://doi.org/10.1890/08-2244.1)

attributeDefinition: Community-weighted mean based on abundance data for canopy height
comment: Traits data from GIFT database (Weigelt et al. 2020, https://doi.org/10.1111/jbi.13623), index calculation according to FD package (Laliberté and Legendre 2010, https://doi.org/10.1890/08-2244.1)

attributeDefinition: Community-weighted mean based on presence-absence data for canopy height
comment: Traits data from GIFT database (Weigelt et al. 2020, https://doi.org/10.1111/jbi.13623), index calculation according to FD package (Laliberté and Legendre 2010, https://doi.org/10.1890/08-2244.1)

comment: Traits data from GIFT database (Weigelt et al. 2020, https://doi.org/10.1111/jbi.13623), index calculation according to FD package (Laliberté and Legendre 2010, https://doi.org/10.1890/08-2244.1)
